title: It Takes Two's Zoe Ball mocks Mike Bushell over awkward fake tan fail

On tonight's episode of Strictly Come Dancing's It Takes Two , Mike Bushell and his professional dance partner Katya Jones joined co-host Zoe Ball on the famous sofa.

The BBC presenter, 56, chatted to Zoe about his upcoming Samba routine to Jump On It by The Sugarhill Gang on Saturday's live show.

Viewers instantly noticed a change in Mike's appearance as he debuted a fresh golden tan in a very dark orange shade.

The star appeared to be glowing as his fake-tan became increasingly darker during his brief appearance on the BBC2 spin-off show.

(Image: BBC)

Zoe Ball mocked the star about his obvious fake-tan fail: "Mike's over here, getting darker by the minute."

Mike laughed and agreed with the co-host: "It's called the Venetian spray tan."

While professional dancer Katya attempted to make a clever joke. She quipped: "It's called the dark horse."

(Image: BBC)

Viewers instantly took to Twitter to comment on Mike's orange-tinged skin.

One user wrote: "Mike's looking slender! Shame about the s*** spraytan..."

While another shared: "Oh Zoe has just answered what I was going to ask - what’s up with Mike’s face?"

A third commented: "I think Mike has been rolled in gravy granules ."

Another pointed out: "Mike really doesn't suit the spray tan."

Katya and Mike made headlines after their performance last week.

Katya sent Twitter into meltdown after her exaggerated counting to Mike during their performance was exposed on Sunday's Strictly Come Dancing results show.

Katya was left incredibly emotional last week after she and BBC presenter Mike wowed the judges with their performance.

(Image: BBC)

After receiving a nine from judge Motsi Mabuse, Katya couldn't contain the tears as they hugged tightly.

Last weekend saw the third celebrity booted off the show as radio DJ Dev Griffin and his professional partner Dianne Buswell join fellow axed contestants Anneka Rice and James Cracknell.

*Strictly Come Dancing returns Saturday at 6.40pm on BBC One
description: The co-host of Strictly Come Dancing's spin-off show It Takes Two made a hilarious comment about Mike Bushell's dodgy fake tan
